bibl.title: The Papyrological Commentary of the Gospel of Mark. Themes, Issues and Some Results of a Work in Progress.
bibl.note: 1. Preliminary Remarks. - 2. The Healing Jesus in the Gospel of Mark [1. Mark 1:29-31: Fever; - 2. Mark 1:39-45, 14:3: Leprosy; - 3. Mark 5:25-34: The Haemorrhaging Woman]. - 3. The Value of Doctors and Medical Practices in the Graeco-Roman World. - 4. Conclusion.

bibl.title: Papyrologie und Exegese. Die Auslegung des Neuen Testaments im Licht der Papyri

bibl.seg: Roberta Mazza, The Papyrological Commentary of the Gospel of Mark. Themes, Issues and Some Results of a Work in Progress.
Jens Herzer (ed.), Papyrologie und Exegese. Die Auslegung des Neuen Testaments im Licht der Papyri = Wissenschaftliche Untersuchungen zum Neuen Testament. 2. Reihe. 341 (TÃ¼bingen, 2012) pp. 173-193.

1. Preliminary Remarks. - 2. The Healing Jesus in the Gospel of Mark [1. Mark 1:29-31: Fever; - 2. Mark 1:39-45, 14:3: Leprosy; - 3. Mark 5:25-34: The Haemorrhaging Woman]. - 3. The Value of Doctors and Medical Practices in the Graeco-Roman World. - 4. Conclusion.
